duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide nursing care and procedures according to physicians orders and nursing protocol.
Administer medication according to the physician's orders and protocol.
Evaluate possible side effects and the overall effectiveness of medication.
Perform BLS (Basic Life support), CPR (cardiopulmonary resuscitation), and other emergency responses.
Must be able to lift up to 50 lbs.

education_certification.credential: Currently licensed as a Registered Nurse in the State of Tennessee or holds a privilege to practice in the State of Tennessee under the Nurse Licensure Compact (NLC).
